title: New client is shit btw
body: Hate it, absolutely shit client. What a waste of 2 years. I'll pay for the old client plz. $20.

replies.body:
You mean the old client that was out of date and broken before you even knew this game existed?

The client that was so terrible the bugs couldn't be fixed at all.
The constant black screen lobbies, dropping lobbies for no reason, losing LP because of these issues.

Yeah let's go back to that.

not sure if you're retarded but this client has been freezing and causing issues (people not being able to lock in etc). So yeah let's go back to the old one that wasn't absolute garbage and didn't make people restart it 15 times because of a "client update" that doesn't even update half the time.

That'd actually mean something, if it wasn't confirmed that all those problems you just mentioned only happen if your computer can't handle the new client out of "low spec" mode.

So you can shut up, go turn on low spec mode and think about how stupid you're being in the corner.
